verbs.description: Donald Trump and Kim Jong Un [V: will] meet on this popular island resort off the coast of Singapore on June 12 .
[ARG0: Donald Trump and Kim Jong Un] [ARGM-MOD: will] [V: meet] [ARGM-LOC: on this popular island resort] [ARGM-LOC: off the coast of Singapore] [ARGM-TMP: on June 12] .
